SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class SharedBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.SharedBoard
public class SharedBoard extends Object
Represents the shared board in the game. The shared board contains information about objectives, scores, visible cards, and decks of cards.

      Returns:

      Retrieves the visible cards on the shared board.
      Returns:

      Sets the objectives on the shared board.
      Parameters:
      obj - An array containing the objectives to set.

    • substituteCard

      public void substituteCard(int position, boolean isGold)
      Substitutes a card on the shared board at the specified position with a new card from the deck.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the card to be substituted.
      isGold - Indicates whether the card to be substituted is a gold card.

    • areCardsOver

      public boolean areCardsOver()
      Checks if there are no cards left in the decks and on the shared board.
      Returns:
      True if there are no cards left, otherwise false.

    • drawDeck

      public ColoredCard drawDeck(boolean isGold)
      Draws a card from the specified deck.
      Parameters:
      isGold - Indicates whether the card should be drawn from the gold card deck.
      Returns:
      The drawn card, or null if the deck is empty.

    • drawVisible

      public ColoredCard drawVisible(int position)
      Retrieves the card at the specified position from the visible cards.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The card at the specified position, or null if no card is present.

    • getScore

      public ConcurrentHashMap<Player,Integer> getScore()
      Retrieves a copy of the score map.
      Returns:
      A copy of the score map.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(Player player, int value)
      Updates the score of the specified player by the given value.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose score needs to be updated
      value - the value by which the score should be updated

    • getGlobalObjectives

      public Objective[] getGlobalObjectives()
      Retrieves the global objectives on the shared board.
      Returns:
      An array containing the global objectives.

    • draw

      public Card draw(Integer position)
      Draw a card in the given position, if available, else null
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the card (0-3: visible, 4: stdDeck, 5: goldDeck)
      Returns:
      the drawn card
